title: MCY Dental Dental Clinic
description: A freelance full stack project that aims to streamline dental clinic operations at MCY Dental Clinic and boost business digital presence by creating a website. This system manages patient records, appointments, and billing information. Technologies used include NextJS for the frontend, Tailwind for styling, MongoDB for the database, and JWT for authentication.

title: Smile Solutions Dental Clinic
description: A software engineering school project that aims to create a dental system for Smile Solutions Dental Clinic. This system streamlines appointment scheduling, patient management, and treatment tracking. Technologies used include NextJS for the frontend, Tailwind for styling, MongoDB for the database, and JWT for authentication.
